product_name: Inov8 Road-X Lite 145 Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Weighing a mere 10 oz. per pair, the Inov8 Road-X Lite 145 Road-Running Shoes are designed for speed work sessions on the road to give you an edge over your rivals on race day. Synthetic mesh uppers with thermoplastic urethane overlays allow great breathability to keep your feet cool and dry. 3mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Synthetic rubber and EVA outsoles offer soft ground contact with a firm, responsive ride. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Weighing a mere 10 oz. per pair, the Inov8 Road-X Lite 145 Road-Running Shoes are designed for speed work sessions on the road to give you an edge over your rivals on race day.
